full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 755 Filed 08/10/22 Page 6 of 262 1711 LC8Cmax1

1    In any event, I'm still unclear what the decision
2 point is. You have decisions to make as to who to call, but
3 you're not seeking anything --
4
5    MS. MENNINGER: No, your Honor. And if I were to call
6 her and ask her something outside of the prior consistent
7 statements, we would brief that to your Honor or bring that up
8 in advance, we would not just do that. It's just that, as your
9 Honor has seen, they shaved a substantial amount of their case
10 off and are not calling a number of witnesses that they
11 intended to call, and we are assessing who we need to call in
12 getting those people here and so forth.
13    So I just, in asking you right this second, what
14 decision we've made about our case in chief, I can't give your
15 Honor an answer.
16    THE COURT: I understand that. I don't think I was
17 seeking that.
18    Mr. Rohrbach, you just began by asking whether they
19 intended to recall Jane. They don't know.
20    MR. ROHRBACH: Right.
21    THE COURT: And whether they intend to call Brian,
22 they don't know.
23    MR. ROHRBACH: Thank you, your Honor.
24    The other issue the government wanted to just flag for
25 the Court is there is a possibility that we'd get to victim 2
by the end of the day today, and I know the Court has --

SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C.
(212) 805-0300

DOJ-OGR-00013284
